othercustomfield.description: Flag to indicate that this Location will stock inventory and the system should auto generate zero-value Inventory Cost Revaluation transactions for new Items that use Standard Costing.
othercustomfield.help: Check this box if this Location will contain inventory and the system should auto generate zero-value Inventory Cost Revaluation transactions for new Items that use Standard Costing.
othercustomfield.label: Auto Inv. Cost Revaluation
